title: Cramer Warns of Market Volatility Ahead of the Fed’s September 20th FOMC Press Conference
description: Jim Cramer, the host of CNBC’s “Mad Money,” recently discussed various topics affecting the stock market, from the Federal Reserve’s upcoming FOMC meeting to earnings reports and IPOs. title: China’s surprise gold import boost strategy for yuan rebound

title: Xsolla Launches Mall, An Online Destination For Video Games
description: Sherman Oaks, United States, September 18th, 2023, Chainwire Xsolla, a global video game commerce company, has announced a new online destination called Xsolla Mall. title: Polygon Labs Details MATIC to POL Transition in New Proposals
description:
On Thursday, September 14, 2023, Polygon Labs officially announced the release of three Polygon Improvement Proposals (PIPs) as part of the proposed Polygon 2.0 upgrade. Prominently featured among them is the replacement of MATIC with POL as the new native coin in the Polygon ecosystem. Last Thursday’s event marked the beginning of the implementation of […]

The post Polygon Labs Details MATIC to POL Transition in New Proposals appeared first on Coin Edition.
